Hero.description: Become an operator prepared for real missions. Real training programs for military, corporate teams, and individual learners.
Hero.descr_bottom_text_1: Become an operator prepared for real missions.
Hero.descr_bottom_text_2: Real training programs for military, corporate teams, and individual learners.

cart_1.description_event: FPV piloting from scratch: full theory, simulator practice, and daytime flights. Learn how to set up radio systems, video links, and batteries. Final test — accuracy and stability drills.

cart_2.description_event: Advanced training for pilots with basic skills. Complex scenarios, recovery after failures, fast reboots. Intensive practice with timed routes and accuracy tasks.

cart_3.description_event: Basic military drone training. Safe flight principles, quick launch, and aerial reconnaissance. Field tasks in small groups under instructor guidance.
